Summary: Looked like 7 a 8 falling stars at the same time close to each other less than a second (Nightvision).
trends: There has been one other sighting in The Hague
There were no other sightings in The Hague on or around July 10th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi was watching the sky from out of my top window of my house, with my night vision just scanning the air for satellite's and stars as there is a lot of light pollution above the hague, night vision is almost required to see stars, you only see very bright stars with out it. note: it capture's infrared. it where multiple objects like a asteroid\ comet that hits the earths atmosphere and explodes. it could be easily right that but i don't know. it all took less then a second. all in a circle at what seemed to be random place's about 7 or 8 "falling stars" with small tails color = unknown as night vision makes it green it gave me a adrenaline shock and right after i might have seen a orb making a little up down movement and vanished. this all happened in the direction of the constellation cepheus.
